website_summaries.verdict: In spite of a few quirks, this is the ultimate My Little Pony pick for youngsters who can't get enough of the popular toy.
pros: Kids will love playing with this interactive version of Twilight Sparkle that responds to sounds and touch with phrases and lights
She also has posable legs and comes with a tiara, just like in the My Little Pony movie
cons: Changing the batteries requires a screwdriver, but the upside of this minor hassle is that they are secure once in place

customer_reviews.title: It's just sorta meh - barely played with after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old daughter and she was super excited at first, but she barely touched it after 2 days. It wasn't as responsive as we'd hoped, and the phrases/songs got repetitive quickly. It still feels like we're missing some phrases or stories or something, but we can't seem to get her to say anything new. Her crown doesn't stay on very well, but it occasionally gets worn by my daughter, so it has some replay value. The lack of leg movement was a bit of a let down for the kids. The head an eye movement was enthralling for a bit, but wasn't enough to keep them engaged.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Order AmazonBasics C Cell Everyday Alkaline Batteries (12-Pack)  When you order this toy.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter Christmas gift was a hit.Took our gal about a minute to find the master on/off power switch and pressing the star on the front right hoof to activate the next feature. Wings move and head turns while the eye lids opened close as the horn glows. Good toy for sit down and self play. The toy becomes a 'playmate'. We ordered AmazonBasics C Cell Everyday Alkaline Batteries (12-Pack) when we ordered this toy/ AmazonBasics batteries are first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Travels

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, we were more impressed than my niece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece as her big “Santa” present. She asked for a “real live unicorn.” We figured she would be super excited and love it, since she loves my little pony. She was impressed by the appearance, but not by its movements. She likes her fur real pets, but this just doesn’t interest her the same way. She offered up its batteries to her brother (that never happens for anything), without any prompting. Seems it’s an attractive prop, but not fun as a robot. On the plus side, she’s been practicing the braiding I taught her on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariss McKalynn

customer_reviews.title: This is a boring toy. Even playdate friends don't play with it.
customer_reviews.text: My child received this for her "big" gift for her 5th birthday. She was excited tot ake it out of the box and play with it for 5 minutes. Then she was bored with it and thought it was boring and in the corner it went. I was late returning it. Now I am stuck with a toy that even her friends don't play with on play dates. That is how much this is a toy that is not enjoyed by children. Even all the kids at play dates don't like it either. I hate I can't return it and am stuck with it. But it is my fault for being late.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and cute, but without any other MLP characters to go with it, this toy gets set aside often
customer_reviews.text: This was a Santa present for my daughter this past Christmas. She likes it, but since all other My Little Pony toys are smaller (the plushes, the sets, etc.) this toy is a stand alone object. I probably wouldn't have purchased it considering she plays more with the sets than this item. Still a good item, but definitely overpriced. I would recommend they create the other characters like Pinky Pie, Rainbow Dash, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerMel

customer_reviews.title: My wife is a My little pony collector and it ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a My little pony collector and it is everything that she imagined cant say a lot for the durability because she is leaving it in the box for collectors purposes.. was larger than we expected..
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Seeing my 6 year old daughters face when she opened this was priceless!! We got this on sale and it is really neat. It is pretty and the eyes are so cute. Goes along the movie version and she was thrilled to watch the movie with her.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Fun for pony fans
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. Arrived in good condition. Works perfectly. Only two minor complaints : for the price, it should have included batteries, and it would have been nice if more songs were included (only 5, I think). It's a cute, interactive toy. And thankfully, it goes to sleep fairly quickly on its own w/o droning on and on like other interactive toys tend to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great toy for christmas! I love the size of this toy, my daughter treats her like her baby. It’s not an obnoxious toy that’s constantly making sounds, it’s very subtle and only speaks when you press the star on her right leg. I loved the horn and the way it lights up when she’s turned on. Overall it’s a great buy. It was a bit pricey but a bit cheaper here on amazon compared to other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved seeing the look on her eyes when she opened ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year-old wanted this for Christmas and "Santa" delivered. I loved seeing the look on her eyes when she opened the package on Christmas morning. She spend the rest of the day playing with Twilight. However, after a few days, she didn't really play with it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Mom

customer_reviews.title: This pony is totally fun. I am not a parent into noisy toys ...
customer_reviews.text: This pony is totally fun. I am not a parent into noisy toys but this one is tolerable. The pony reacts quite a bit to your touch and nuzzle. Her mane hair is keeping nice even with lots of 4 year old brushing. While the box is big the pony isn’t huge even for our tiny city house.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Good looking toy but wish it would do more. It's pretty robotic and has scattered mouvments but my 3year old daughter seem to like it. Got for a good price on Amazon as I would never had spent the $130 that Toys R Us was asking for it.

customer_reviews.title: Twilight is a Delight!

It’s interactive which my daughter loves. It’s not repetitive, either, which is what I like. It is pretty delicate so we’ve try to keep it out of reach of our 18 month old son. He’s not very gentle but I’m happy to report he had t broken Twilight Sparkle yet!

customer_reviews.text: This toy does talk and it moves its head. It also blinks its eyes, and that is cool. However, I did not feel like it was interactive. It asked my daughter to pick it up to fly with it, but then she did and it didn’t say anything. And then a little while later and said “Weeeee”, but by that time it wasn’t even in the air anymore. It also kept saying the same thing. It also did not respond when my daughter spoke to it, or pat it.

product_meta.title: My Little Pony Movie Toy: Magical Princess Twilight Sparkle Interactive Plush - Says 90+ Phrases
product_meta.description:
My Little Pony Toy Talking and Singing Twilight Sparkle, Soft Interactive Purple Unicorn With Wings, Kids Ages 3 and Up
Product description (optional) : Kids can enjoy friendship moments with this interactive My Little Pony Twilight Sparkle toy! This pony doll can move her head and hoof, say 90 plus phrases, and light up her horn during play. Press the button on her foot to hear her talk about friendship, tell stories or sing songs. Touch her unicorn horn and it will light up as this Twilight Sparkle toy talks about her magical spells. Watch as she flutters her shiny wings and imagine her soaring over Equestria. She has poseable legs so your child can help her sit or stand. Princess Twilight Sparkle figure also has beautiful long purple hair and a tiara inspired by the one she wears in the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic animated tv series and My Little Pony: The Movie. Twilight Sparkle is an alicorn princesses, meaning she's a pony with Pegasus wings and a unicorn horn. She is a purple pony with a star cutie mark, and is the princess of friendship! My Little Pony and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro. Materials: Polyester fibers, polyethylene foam. Surface wash only.
feature_bullets: 4 RESPONSIVE PLAY MODES this interactive My Little Pony unicorn with wings says 90 plus phrases, tells stories, sings, and talks about spells. Press the right, front hoof’s star on her my little pony plush to hear her speak
LIGHT UP UNICORN HORN the soft Twilight Sparkle my little pony dolls horn lights up and flashes as she talks about her spells. Plus, her purple mane is long for fun styling and care

RESPONDS TO SOUND AND TOUCH children ages 3 and up will love talking to and interacting with this fun Twilight Sparkle toy from the My Little Pony movie. Pet her on her ears, nose, and more to trigger different responses

POSEABLE LEGS kids can help the Twilight Sparkle pony doll sit or stand to imagine lots of fun playtime activities. Her legs easily fold in or stick back out so you can watch a movie and more with your new magical friend

BEAUTIFUL PURPLE HAIR AND TIARA ACCESSORY this figure has long purple hair and a tiara inspired by the one Twilight Sparkle has on the My Little Pony Equestria Girls Friendship is Magic animated TV series

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars254 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
